name: cpp-class-creator
description: A very simple class creation extension for Visual Studio Code from FleeXo

cpp.creator.setPath.description: Specifies the path, where the class is created or set it to true when you want the path to be dynamically inputted. [setting: cpp.creator.setPath = "path" or true]

cpp.creator.createFolder.description: Create an extra folder for the class.

cpp.creator.useHPPEnding.description: Use the C++ header naming (.hpp), if set to false the extension will create .h files

cpp.creator.useCCEnding.description: Use the C++ implementation file naming (.cc), if set to false the extension will create .cpp files

cpp.creator.headerProtection.usePragmaOn.description: Adds the *#pragma once* to the .hpp buffer.

cpp.creator.privateFirst.description: Wheather private: should go before or after public: in the header file. If set to true private goes first.
